summary: 13 year old Henry Matthews struggles with life after his reservist father is deployed to Afghanistan. With the help of a local pastor, the boy decides to take part in a local singing contest.
cast: Nicki Aycox|Uriah Shelton|Dash Mihok|Thad Mickler|Ruben Studdard|Howard Green|Barbara Kincaid-Hill|James Handy|Jonathan Fuller|Danny Vinson|Maggie Ballard|Peggy Vanek-Titus|Cory Gluck|Jerry Douglass Sims|Anna Marie Dobbins|Alan Hunter|Jennifer Price|Evan Metropoulos|Todd Simpson|Kristen Barkuloo|John Paul Bruno|Callie Hunter|Kymrence Young|Trace Adkins|Kayla Dailey|T. Jay O'Brien|Jim Lucas|Robert W. Hill|Lexi Alexander|Eric Housh|Darius Van Sluytman|Carlissa Arrow|Victoria Ashford|Dotan Baer|J. Neil Bloomer
title: Lifted
